Cozy, for guests to feel like home, our standard rooms are fully-equipped with high-tech facilities, being located from floor 1 to 9. Self â€“ controlled air conditioning system, LCD TV, laptop size safe, bathroom cosmetics and accessories, minibar and access to Vitality Wellness Club are some of the facilities of the Standard rooms.

rooms.name: Luxury Room
rooms.description:
- LCD TV
 - Free Wireless Internet
 - Safe (laptop size)
 - Bathrobe
 - Slippers
 - Hairdryer
 - Mini Bar
 - Coffee maker
 - Iron and ironing board

Situated at the 10th and 11th floor, Business Class rooms feature an imposing view of the city. From the standard facilities, guests will benefit of express check-in & check-out and also free access to Business Lounge, where they can relax, serve refreshments and snacks or organize small business meetings.

rooms.name: Twins Room
rooms.description:
- LCD TV
 - Free Wireless Internet
 - Safe (laptop size)
 - Bathrobe
 - Slippers
 - Hairdryer
 - Mini Bar
 - Coffee maker
 - Iron and ironing board

With a special ambiance and a refined design, the spacious suites offered by Ramada Plaza Bucharest are perfect for a comfortable stay, for both tourists and business travelers. Situated at the 11th floor, the suites feature among the standard facilities, an exquisite cosmetic line, express check-in & check-out and free access to Business Lounge.
